lyrics:
5 contributorsleave you alone lyricsverse 1
i know i dont say youre beautiful enough
but that dont mean it aint on my mind
and i know sometimes we have differences and fight
but i hate when i see you cry

prechorus
and if youre ever worried i got one foot out that door
i can promise you right now baby

chorus
my love wont leave you alone
just so you know
when i say forever girl
i mean im never ever gonna do you wrong
and i wont let you go
talkin us growin old
heres dusk til dawn
well be goin on and on
baby my love wont leave you alone
nooh

verse 2
just like that red winе stain on the carpet
yeah girl i aint goin no whеre hell nah

wherever you go ill be there
see kane brown liveget tickets as low as 19you might also likechorus

when i say forever girl

and i wont let you go
